column3: On January 1, 2013, Abbott Laboratories distributed 1,577 million shares of AbbVie common stock. For periods prior to the separation, the weighted-average basic and diluted shares outstanding was based on the number of shares of AbbVie common stock outstanding on the distribution date. Refer to Note 5 for information regarding the calculation of basic and diluted earnings per common share for the years ended December 31, 2014 and 2013.
